trajectory.content: Good question. ðŸ‘‰ First: do you already know about prompt engineering?

Perfect. Prompt engineering is about single instructions. Context engineering is about structuring the whole input (system rules, memory, tools). Example: instead of just a one-off prompt, you set role, goals, and workflow.
